item.name: POST

body.raw:
{
    "brandName": "ROYAL London",
    "name": "POCKET WATCH",

    "desc": "Absolutely stunning double half hunter pocket watch presented to you by Royal London.  The watch opens out fully on both sides to stand independently as an ornamental clock allowing for maximum usage whilst it also benefits from a mechanical movement.  You can see the stunning inner workings and craftsmanship that's gone into this beautiful timepiece even without opening the watch through a small viewing window.  The winder position sits at 3 o'clock.  The watch will be provided with matching bolt ring chain and will come with a two year guarantee along with branded packaging.  Please note this watch is not suitable for engraving.",
    "tag": ["men"],
    "price": 39500.00,
    "rate": "0.1"
}

request.description:
jobcardId: String,
    custPhone: String,
    iid: String,
    description: String,
    remark: [Boolean],
    deliveryDate: Date,
    cost: String,
    payment: [String],
    status: [
      "accepted",
      "unrepairable",
      "completed",
      "handedOver",
      "await",
      "started",
    ],

item.description:
jobcardid: String,
    pid: String,
    custphone: String,
    date_time: Date,
    description: String,
    remark: String,
    tobe_delivered: String,
    repair_cost: String,
    advance_payment: String,
    balance: String,
    status: {
      type: String,
      enum: [
        "accepted",
        "unrepairable",
        "completed",
        "handed_over",
        "await",
        "select",
      ],
      default: "select"
